Class DrillLimitRelBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.calcite.rel.AbstractRelNode
      • org.apache.calcite.rel.SingleRel
        • org.apache.drill.exec.planner.common.DrillLimitRelBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, org.apache.calcite.plan.RelOptNode, org.apache.calcite.rel.RelNode, DrillRelNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrillLimitRel, LimitPrel

    public abstract class DrillLimitRelBase
extends org.apache.calcite.rel.SingleRel
implements DrillRelNode
    Base class for logical and physical Limits implemented in Drill
